Exciting research opportunity @ ESA to harness the power of AI for Earth Observation data

Unique opportunity for ESA Research Fellow (Post-Doctoral) on the development of innovative Earth Observation (EO) solutions using Artificial Intelligence (AI) to advance understanding of our planet (http://www.esa.int/eo). You will be based in ESA/ESRIN (Frascati, Italy) and be part of a growing dynamic, multi-disciplinary research team at the phi-lab. You will be able to develop your own AI research and associated innovative EO applications, alongside a growing team of data scientists and researchers passionate about innovation.

Apply before 14 May 2020 at https://bit.ly/2ylNd60 (Ref ID 8827)
